Angel, Zan, and secrets of the lost: intermission.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Completed Epics Section III: Angel, Zan, and secrets of the lost: intermission.
By Daeore Dermegil on Thursday, April 24, 2003 - 08:07 pm:

*The author, Daeore, sits in a circle with Angel, Zan, Miki, Sarah, Durahan, a Worm, the assistant, and Miki's father. They all seem to be talking.*

Daeore: Well YES, killing you off was part of the script! You knew that when you signed on JiJi! (JiJi, japanese for 'old man')

Miki's Father: Oh sure, I get a letter and a line or two in flash back sequences, and thats it! I figured I'd end up with a little more... Action!

Worm *sulking voice of 'Tully' from seasame street: Least you were only taken off set... I ended up run through by sword monkey over here...

Durahan snickers.

Zan, in a james bond voice (Sean Connery version): At least you get lines. Me? I chirp, once! Sure, I look all cool and scary, but I don't get to show off my degree in voice acting!

Sarah: All this roughing it in the forests is for the birds. You are going to improve things arent you?

Miki: Well at least we are out of the woods. Literally. I hope this journal thing is over soon... I'm going to get courperal tunnel at this rate.

Daeore: You're the one who insisted on writing it. You only have to LOOK like you are writing on screen you know.

Angel (voice actor for Kasumi from Ranma 1/2): He has nice writing though. Much better than yours, at any rate.

Daeore: Thibbit!

The Dean walks by holding a table with snacks and stuff on it.

Zan: Thanks Dean! What kept you?

Dean, in an equally civilized james bond-ish voice): Had trouble with the door.

Daeore: not again...

*camera pans to the door... and a huge hole in the wall beside it.*


==========


Sorry for the delay, again. Just posting somthing to keep you all informed of my existance. ^_^
